'''Build 0035''' (or '''Build 1.66.0035.0''') is a development version of {{edition|xbox 360}}. This version is based off [[Java Edition Beta 1.6.6]].

== Removals ==
* Removed the option to refresh the online games list in the world menu as it crashed the game when pressed.{{More info needed|What exactly? Could just be emulator issues, as modding the game package and enabling online play seems to work.}}

== Fixes ==
* Fixed the gamma slider being stuck at 0.{{More info needed|Unconfirmed change}}
* Fixed for the blocks randomly appearing after destroying it.{{More info needed|Needs source}}

== Bugs ==
* There may be a memory leak as the game lags increasingly after playing for a while.
* The spawn point is reset after saving and reloading a world.
There may be other bugs not yet documented.

== Trivia ==
* This build, and all builds prior, are internally referred to as "Minecraft" instead of "Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition" when released.
